languages.text: {n}Висирь покорно кивает и складывает странный жест крючковатыми пальцами. Ткачи вторят ему.{/n} "Три сотни плетей, чтобы плоть познала раскаяние. Три дюжины циклов без пищи и сна, чтоб от помыслов чуждых разум очистить. Кровавая паутина принимает наказание. И раскаивается. Стыдно нам, что Домин недовол{mf|ен|на} осталась. Надеемся мы, что плата соразмерна".

{n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь покорно кивает и складывает странный жест крючковатыми пальцами. Ткачи вторят ему.{/n} "Три сотни плетей, чтобы плоть познала раскаяние. Три дюжины циклов без пищи и сна, чтоб от помыслов чуждых разум очистить. Кровавая паутина принимает наказание. И раскаивается. Стыдно нам, что Домин недовол{mf|ен|на} осталась. Надеемся мы, что плата соразмерна".

Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repends. We are ashamed of Enim's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir nickt gehorsam und bildet mit seinen krummen Fingern ein merkwürdiges Zeichen. Die Spinner stimmen ein.{/n} "Dreihundert Peitschenhiebe, auf dass das Fleisch Buße kenne. Drei Dutzend Zyklen ohne Nahrung oder Schlaf, auf dass der Verstand von überflüssigen Gedanken und Plänen gesäubert werde. Das Blutgesponnene Netz akzeptiert seine Strafe. Und bereut. Wir schämen uns ob des Missfallens {mf|des|der} Domin. Wir hoffen, der Preis, den wir bezahlen, ist angemessen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

Drei Dutzend Zyklen ohne Nahrung oder Schlaf, auf dass der Verstand von überflüssigen Gedanken und Plänen gesäubert werde. Das Blutgesponnene Netz akzeptiert seine Strafe. Und bereut. Wir schämen uns ob des Missfallens {mf|des|der} Domin. Wir hoffen, der Preis, den wir bezahlen, ist angemessen."

languages.text: {n}El Visir asiente, dócil, y hace un signo extraño con sus dedos torcidos. Los tejedores responden a coro.{/n} «Trescientos latigazos, para que la carne conozca el arrepentimiento. Tres docenas de ciclos sin comida ni sueño, para que la mente se purifique de pensamientos y designios superfluos. La Red Sanguinolenta acepta su castigo y se arrepiente. Nos avergüenza la desaprobación de{mf|l| la} Domin. Esperamos que el precio que pagamos sea adecuado».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは従順にうなずき、曲がった指で奇妙なサインを作る。紡績工たちが返事を返す。{/n}「300回のむち打ちにより、肉体が悔い改めることを知る。食事も睡眠もない30ダースのサイクルは、そうすることで精神が余計な考えや思惑を浄化する。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは罰を受け入れる。そして悔い改める。我らはドミンのご不興を買ったことを恥じている。相応な代償を支払いたいと願っているのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは従順にうなずき、曲がった指で奇妙なサインを作る。織り手たちが返事を返す。{/n}「300回のむち打ちにより、肉体が悔い改めることを知る。食事も睡眠もない30ダースのサイクルは、そうすることで精神が余計な考えや思惑を浄化する。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは罰を受け入れる。そして悔い改める。我らはエニムのご不興を買ったことを恥じている。相応な代償を支払いたいと願っているのだ」

languages.text: {n}宿老顺从地点点头，弯曲的手指做了个古怪的手势。织网者们齐声回应着。{/n}“鞭笞三百次，令肉体知道悔改。不吃不睡，重复三十巡，令头脑消除无用的思想与杂念。织血罗网愿意接受惩罚，愿意悔改。我们让秘者感到了不快，我们为此十分羞愧，我们希望能为此付出相称的代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老顺从地点点头，弯曲的手指做了个古怪的手势。织网者们齐声回应着。{/n}“鞭笞三百次，令肉体知道悔改。不吃不睡，重复三十巡，令头脑消除无用的思想与杂念。织血罗网愿意接受惩罚，愿意悔改。我们让秘者感到了不快，我们为此十分羞愧，我们希望能为此付出相称的代价。”

languages.text: {n}Le vizir acquiesce docilement et esquisse de ses doigts crochus un signe étrange auquel les tisseurs répondent aussitôt.{/n} « Trois cents coups de fouet, pour que la chair fasse pénitence. Trente cycles sans manger ni dormir, pour que l'esprit s'affranchisse des pensées et dessins extérieurs. La Toile de Sang accepte son châtiment, et elle se repent. Nous avons mécontenté {mf|le|la} Domin à notre plus grande honte, et nous espérons que le prix payé pour cet affront est à la hauteur du préjudice subi. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir acquiesce docilement et esquisse de ses doigts crochus un signe étrange auquel les tisseurs répondent aussitôt.{/n} « Trois cents coups de fouet, pour que la chair fasse pénitence. Trente cycles sans manger ni dormir, pour que l'esprit s'affranchisse des pensées et dessins extérieurs. La Toile de Sang accepte son châtiment, et elle se repent. Nous avons mécontenté {mf|le|la} Domin à notre plus grande honte, et nous espérons que le prix payé pour cet affront est à la hauteur du préjudice subi. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir, itaatkâr bir şekilde başını eğerek bükülü parmaklarıyla tuhaf bir işaret yapıyor. Dokurlar da onu takip ediyor.{/n} "Üç yüz kamçıya vurulalım ki etimiz tövbeyi bilsin. Ağzımıza yemek, gözümüze uyku girmeden otuz altı döngü geçirelim ki zihnimiz dışarıdan gelen tüm fikirlerden ve gayelerden arınsın. Kanipi Ağı, cezasına razı gelerek tövbe ediyor. Domin'i memnun edememenin utancını yaşıyoruz. Ödeyeceğimiz bedelin münasip geleceğini umuyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods obediently and makes a strange sign with his crooked fingers. The spinners echo back.{/n} "Three hundred lashes, so the flesh may know repentance. Three dozen cycles without food or sleep, that the mind may be cleansed of extraneous thoughts and designs. The Bloodspun Web accepts its punishment. And repents. We are ashamed at the Domin's displeasure. We hope the price we pay is proportionate."
